context: Globant S.A. is a digital transformation and technology services company focused on software development, digital experience, and AI transformation. AI-powered reinvention services. Global delivery network.

competitors.name: Accenture
competitors.notes: Top competitor and most similar to Globant. Founded in 1989, Dublin-based professional services giant with 800,000+ employees across 120+ countries. Generates 2,788% the revenue of Globant. Offers comprehensive services in digital transformation, cloud computing, cybersecurity, strategy, and consulting.

competitors.name: Thoughtworks
competitors.notes: Established in 1993 with around 10,500 'Thoughtworkers' across 19 countries including Latin America and Asia. Provides software engineering, digital product development, consulting, and advisory services.

competitors.name: EPAM Systems
competitors.notes: One of Globant's top competitors. Public company founded in Newtown, Pennsylvania in 1993 in the IT Services industry. Major player in digital transformation and technology services.

competitors.name: Cognizant
competitors.notes: Major player in digital transformation offering IT consulting, technology services, and digital solutions. Focus on innovation and customer-centricity with cutting-edge solutions.

competitors.name: Infosys
competitors.notes: Top competitor. Global leader in consulting, technology, and outsourcing services with strong focus on digital transformation and innovation. Known for delivering high-quality solutions.

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Multinational technology company offering cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and digital transformation services. Strong focus on innovation and technology across industries.

competitors.name: SoftServe
competitors.notes: IT services and digital transformation company competing in similar markets.

competitors.name: Perficient
competitors.notes: Digital consultancy and technology services provider.

competitors.name: GlobalLogic
competitors.notes: Digital product engineering and transformation services company.

competitors.name: Wipro
competitors.notes: Global IT services and consulting competitor.

competitors.name: Endava
competitors.notes: IT services company focused on digital transformation.

competitors.name: UST
competitors.notes: Listed as one of Globant's top competitors.

competitors.name: Happiest Minds
competitors.notes: Digital transformation and IT services competitor.

competitors.name: BairesDev
competitors.notes: Prominent outsourcing partner and chief Globant competitor. Offers flexible models including staff augmentation, dedicated teams, and full-scale outsourcing.
